Today in Caithness, it's looking poor with 3 ft @6s N swell and fresh 24 mph NNW winds, making for blown-out conditions. Tomorrow sees a slight improvement with 6 ft @9s NNW swell and lighter 18 mph N winds, offering some workable waves at spots like Point of Ness and Thurso East. By the day after, conditions clean up nicely with 4 ft @7s NW swell and light 7 mph S winds, making it a great day to hit the water at various spots. Best: day after.
